hero.description: Welcome to <green>Heart & Home Green Clean</green>, your trusted provider of eco-friendly house cleaning services in Arizona West Valley. We specialize in non-toxic, sustainable cleaning solutions that keep your home fresh, safe, and spotless. Whether you need routine cleaning, deep cleaning, or move-in/move-out services, we're here to help.

badges.title: Reliable
badges.description: Fully Insured & Bonded for Your Peace of Mind

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Eco-Friendly Cleaning, Trusted by Your Neighbors

serviceCards.title: Routine Cleaning
serviceCards.description: Keep your home fresh with our weekly, bi-weekly, or monthly cleaning plans.

serviceCards.title: Deep Cleaning
serviceCards.description: A top-to-bottom clean, perfect for seasonal refreshes.

serviceCards.title: Move In/Move Out
serviceCards.description: Get your home ready for the next chapter.

serviceCards.title: Office Cleaning
serviceCards.description: Maintain a healthy and spotless workspace.

greenClean.title: <green>Green Clean for a Healthier Home</green>
greenClean.description: At Heart & Home Green Clean, we believe that a clean home shouldn't come at the expense of your health or the environment. Our eco-conscious cleaning services provide a deep clean using plant-based, non-toxic products, ensuring a safe and chemical-free space for your family.

steps.title: 3 Easy Steps To A <green>Cleaner, Healthier Home</green>

items.title: Get Your Free Estimate
items.description: Simply fill out our easy estimate form or call us at <green>(480) 999-8018</green> to get your estimate and we will schedule your cleaning!

items.title: Our Professionals Will Clean Your Home
items.description: Our professional cleaners will arrive promptly to your home at the scheduled time to clean.

items.title: Relax, We've Got the Cleaning Covered
items.description: Come back to a clean home and spend your time with those you love and doing what you love.

testimonials.name: Rebecca Moxie
testimonials.text: Consistent, friendly, and always do a thorough job. We have worked with CP Complete Care Cleaning for 3 years & they always make our home clean & refreshed. Highly recommended.

testimonials.name: Todd Gartman
testimonials.text: Jessica, Chelsea and their team ensures that our home is cleaned with care when they visit. We appreciate them and the service they have given us.

testimonials.name: Anita Regalado-Geddes
testimonials.text: Jessica, Chelsea, and Mikey are amazing! My house has never been so clean. Thank you for a great job!

items.question: What areas do you serve?
items.answer: We proudly serve Arizona West Valley, including surrounding communities.

items.question: Are your cleaning products safe for children and pets?
items.answer: Yes! We use 100% eco-friendly, non-toxic products that are safe for kids, pets, and allergy-sensitive households.

items.question: How do I book a cleaning?
items.answer: You can schedule online, call/text us at (480) 999-8018, or email us at info@heartandhomegreenclean.com.

intro.title: Heart & Home <green>Green Clean</green> is here for you.
paragraphs: To us, cleaning is more than just a service we provide physically. It is also a gift of time.
Our goal is to enrich the lives of our clients and their families by providing residential and commercial cleaning and organizational services.
We believe that your time is valuable and pride ourselves on helping maximize it for you.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: Our mission is to <green>deliver exceptional green cleaning services</green> that promote healthier homes and a cleaner planet. Our Core Purpose: To give people back their time and provide peace of mind.

purpose.title: Our Core Purpose
purpose.content: <pink>To give people back their time and provide peace of mind.</pink>

items.title: Expertise, Focus, & Growth Mindset
items.description: We are experts in our field, committed to continuous learning and improvement. We approach challenges with a problem-solving mindset, think critically, and always look for ways to grow and deliver the best solutions for our clients.

items.title: Reliability & Work Ethic
items.description: We take pride in our work, show up on time, follow through on commitments, and do what it takes to get the job done right.

items.title: Initiative & Problem-Solving
items.description: We ask the right questions, think independently, and take proactive steps to solve problems. We don't wait for instructions—we take ownership and find solutions.

items.title: Fun & Professional
items.description: We maintain a can-do attitude, ensuring we are easy to work with and adaptable to the needs of our clients and team. We approach every job with professionalism and without complaints.

subheader.title: Your All In One Destination For <green>Green Clean</green>

experienceSection.title: Experience the <green>Difference</green>
paragraphs: Our eco-friendly approach doesn't just clean your space—It transforms it. We believe that a truly clean environment should feel fresh and natural, without harsh chemicals or artificial fragrances.
Using environmentally conscious products and methods, we create spaces that are not only spotless but also healthier for you, your family, your employees, and our planet.

items.title: Routine Cleaning
items.description: We'll fight the mess for you. Our routine weekly, biweekly or monthly cleanings will keep your home tidy.

sections.title: All rooms include:
items: Light dusting - furniture, fixtures, and appliances
Light tidy - bed, side tables, dresser
Wipe down and polish - furniture, fixtures, appliances
Vacuum/mop - vacuum and/or mop all areas
Garbage removal - bag replaced

sections.title: Bathroomss:
items: ALL THINGS LISTED ABOVE +
Clean/disinfect - shower, tub, and toilets
Wipe down - counters, mirrors, and sink

sections.title: Kitchen:
items: ALL THINGS LISTED ABOVE +
Wipe down - stove top, oven door, sink, refrigerator door, dishwasher door, cabinets (as needed), microwave (inside and out)

sections.title: Rotating/As needed:
items: Dusting/wiping vents, fans, baseboards, and inside of oven

sections.title: Add-ons (additional fee):
items: Dishes
Extra tidying
Laundry

items.title: Office Cleaning
items.description: Maintain a healthy and spotless workspace.

sections.title: Office Cleaning Services:
items: Dusting & Surface Cleaning – Wipe down desks, tables, shelves, and other surfaces
Trash & Recycling Removal – Empty all wastebaskets and recycling bins
Vacuuming & Floor Care – Vacuum carpets, rugs, and hard floors; mop as needed
Restroom Sanitization – Clean and disinfect sinks, toilets, mirrors, and countertops
Kitchen/Break Room Cleaning – Sanitize countertops, sinks, and appliances
Glass & Mirror Cleaning – Spot-clean windows, glass partitions, and mirrors
High-Touch Surface Disinfection – Disinfect doorknobs, light switches, and shared equipment
Reception & Common Area Cleaning – Ensure lobbies and meeting areas are welcoming

items.title: Deep Cleaning
items.description: More than a routine cleaning, deep cleans leave dirt and grime nowhere to hide.

sections.title: All rooms:
items: Heavy dusting - furniture, fixtures, appliances, ceiling fans, vents, window sills, and blinds
Wipe down - baseboards, walls (touch-up), doors, door handles, furniture, fixtures, appliances, and window sills
Vacuum/mop - vacuum and/or mop all areas

sections.title: Bathrooms:
items: ALL THINGS LISTED ABOVE +
Clean/disinfect - shower, tub, and toilets
Wipe down - counters, mirrors, cabinet doors (inside and out), and sink

sections.title: Kitchen:
items: ALL THINGS LISTED ABOVE +
Wipe down - oven and microwave (inside and out), stove top, cabinet doors (inside and out), sinks, outside of refrigerator, outside of dishwasher

items.title: Move In/Move Out
items.description: Your move is already stressful. We'll clean where you're leaving, where you're going, or both so you can enjoy your new home sooner.

sections.title: All rooms:
items: Heavy dusting - furniture, fixtures, appliances, ceiling fans, vents, window sills, and blinds
Wipe down - baseboards, walls (touch-up), doors, door handles, furniture, fixtures, appliances, and window sills
Vacuum/mop - vacuum and/or mop all areas

sections.title: Bathrooms:
items: ALL THINGS LISTED ABOVE +
Clean/disinfect - shower, tub, and toilets
Wipe down - counters, mirrors, cabinet doors (inside and out), and sink

sections.title: Kitchen:
items: ALL THINGS LISTED ABOVE +
Appliances - clean out refrigerator, oven, and microwave
Wipe down - counters, sink, cabinets, drawers, outside of appliances, behind and under appliances
